intro: Procris boninensis, commonly known as the Bonin starflower, is a flowering plant native to the Bonin Islands. It belongs to the family Onagraceae and is characterized by its star-shaped flowers. The plant typically grows in coastal areas and is adapted to saline environments. It has small, lanceolate leaves and produces bright yellow or white blooms. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
